message.name: INF_NONIDENTICALEVIDENCESHARING_NOTIFICATION
message.locale: An evidence record of type %1c has been updated or added on Case %2s which may affect Case %3s.

message.name: INF_NONIDENTICALEVIDENCESHARING_NOTIFICATION_DETAILS
message.locale: An evidence record of type %1c has been updated or added on Case %2s which may affect Case %3s.

message.name: INF_IDENTICALEVIDENCESHARING_NOTIFICATION
message.locale: An evidence record of type %1c has been shared from Case %2s. This is available for synchronization on Case %3s.

message.name: INF_IDENTICALEVIDENCESHARING_NOTIFICATION_DETAILS
message.locale: An evidence record of type %1c has been shared from Case %2s. This is available for synchronization on Case %3s.

message.name: ERR_PARSER_CONFIG
message.locale: Failed to create DOM Document for comparison widget data.

message.name: ERR_DATA_CORRUPT
message.locale: Failed to convert data for comparison widget from DOM Document to Unbounded String.

message.name: INF_LABEL_EFFECTIVE_FROM
message.locale: Effective Date

message.name: INF_LABEL_UPDATED_BY
message.locale: Updated By

message.name: INF_LABEL_UPDATED_DATE_TIME
message.locale: Updated Date Time

message.name: INF_LABEL_EVENT
message.locale: Event

message.name: INF_LABEL_EVIDENCE
message.locale: Evidence

message.name: INF_MESSAGE_SUPERSEDE
message.locale: If you accept and activate the incoming record, the record displayed with the warning icon below will be superseded.

message.name: INF_MESSAGE_REMOVED
message.locale: If you accept the incoming record, the record displayed with the warning icon below will become 'pending removal'.

message.name: INF_MESSAGE_DISCARDED
message.locale: If you accept the incoming record, the record displayed with the warning icon below will be discarded.

message.name: INF_LABEL_EXISTING
message.locale: Existing

message.name: INF_LABEL_INCOMING
message.locale: Incoming

message.name: INF_LABEL_AFFECTED_BY
message.locale: Affected Evidence

message.name: INF_MESSAGE_NO_EVIDENCE_TO_COMPARE_TO
message.locale: There is no existing evidence to compare to.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCEBROKER_IDENTICAL_CONFIG_RECORDS_EXIST
message.locale: Multiple identical sharing configurations for evidence of type '%1c' exist. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_TARGET_SYSTEM_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Target system, %1s not found.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_BROKER_NOTIFY_CHANGE
message.locale: The notify action for evidence sharing has failed. Please contact the administrator.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_BROKER_DOCUMENT_CREATION_FAILED
message.locale: The document creation has failed. Please contact the administrator.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_BROKER_INCORRECT_DATE_FORMAT
message.locale: Incorrect date format.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_SHARING_XML_DOCUMENT_INVALID_WITH_SCHEMA
message.locale: The evidence sharing document is invalid with the schema provided.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_IDENTICAL_COMPARISON_NO_ITEM_SELECTED
message.locale: No evidence records are selected for comparison.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_IDENTICAL_COMPARISON_MORE_THAN_MAXIMUM_ALLOWED_NUMBER_SELECTED
message.locale: A maximum of %1s existing evidence records can be selected for comparison.
